data.title: Working At Cole Haan: Company Overview and Culture
data.meta_description: Learn about working at Cole Haan from employee reviews and detailed data on culture, salaries, demographics, management, financial, and more.
data.text:
Cole Haan overview

Industry

Retail

Revenue

Headquarters

Employees

120

Founded In

Organization Type

Private

Cole Haan is built on American craftsmanship and ingenuity. Cole Haan combine traditional methods, timeless style and modern innovations to create footwear and accessories for optimists of all ages. This company was started to make good things for people who make good things happen; it still does.

Cole Haan has been around for a long time. It was founded back in 1928. This established company loves to hire graduates from Fashion Institute of Technology, with 13.3% of its employees having attended Fashion Institute of Technology. Cole Haan is a great place to work and is featured as number 1 on Zippia's list of Best Companies to Work for in Greenland, NH.The average employee at Cole Haan makes $33,314 per year. In comparison, some of its highest paying competitors, like VOLCOM, Steve Madden, and C. Wonder, pay $42,478, $40,610, and $40,087, respectively.

Based in New Hampshire, Cole Haan is a small retail company with only 120 employees and an annual revenue of $18.0M.
